extendedInfo.description: Brief Introductionyou can search âZâ to get more relevant themeï¼Specially designed for GO Launcher EX. Want an extreme makeover for your phones?Try it now!Notice1. Please make sure you have installed GO Launcher EX V2.58 and GO Locker V1.12 or above. 2. Click Menu>Plugins>GO Locker, choose a theme you like and apply it to your phone.Thank you for your continued support. Any advice or suggestion is appreciated. Feel free to contact us if you have any problems or suggestions.

reviews.title: froze
reviews.comment: it sometimes freezes and i had to take my phone battery out and restart the phone. other than that, no other problems. please put a battery indicator while charging or all the time if possible
reviews.author: Kevin Callao

reviews.comment: I love this locker! It\'s the best one I\'ve had so far. Way to go!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it\342\231\245
reviews.comment: PLEASE CREATE MORE THEMES SIMILAR TO THESE ADORABLE THING c: it\'s so simple, and I\'ll prolly install all of theme if you\'d make more. Good job btw! You\'re the beeest :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Desirable
reviews.comment: Something iOS devices dont have without jailbreaking is full customisation. Stuff like this shows why Android is the leading brand in smartphone devices. Oh, and this theme is great, love it. :3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just a little detail to become 5 star
reviews.comment: How come the slider doesn\'t go all the way till the other side? I can only slide past halfway and it\'ll unlock for me... It\'d be great if we can slide for the whole way because or else it\'ll look a bit weird. Nevertheless, a very clean-looking, nice locker!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Depends
reviews.comment: I know how many people like this becausd of the simplicity, but i do think thats theres a bit to little info...maybe you could add a button where info such as battery percentage could come out?? and a way to be able to access your sms\'s and calls would be nice too :I ahaha and 12 hour format would also..be nice xD
reviews.author: Stephanie Kim

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: Glitches at times. I have to take the battery out of my phone at times. But a cute theme.
reviews.author: Melissa Centeno

reviews.title: 12 Hour format please?
reviews.comment: I love this so much. The only problems i have with it is the 24 hr format. If you could make it into a 12 hr format. Oh and please make the fonts a lil bigger. Thaaaaanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Current favorite!
reviews.comment: Looove the simplicity of this lockscreen. Only thing missing is battery percentage when charging.
reviews.author: Christina Clemente

reviews.title: Clean
reviews.comment: Such a clean, non-cluttered lock screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well done 5*
reviews.comment: I have to say my top Go Locker Theme, please have some more simple themes like this.. I love it.. Keep this great work. Well done dev.. SGSII
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Multiple sliders?
reviews.comment: \303\216n your screenshots it shows multiple sliders but I can\'t do that..
reviews.author: mihai petrisor

reviews.title: Love it love it!!
reviews.comment: Please make more milk related apps!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looove it
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this theme for a few months now and I\'ve gotten used to it. I love the simplicity it displays and that I can customize the background for it. Fortunately due to the grey color you can see more of your background instead of a giant clock or slide. This is perfect for the simple kind of people. :) x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple Yet, Stylish ^__^
reviews.comment: I like white the most, plus the locker is simple. Looks queit mature :3.
reviews.author: Hinoka katsumi
